1.content:
Welcome to Danton! Which girl will gain weight?

Violet Nightshade- A goth girl who loves all things dark and spooky and her flowers dead.

DJ Candy- A disc jockey with a passion for partying, dancing and making music.

Renée- A girl who loves pigs and owns a nature preserve.

Maria- A girl who REALLY loves to eat.
1.title: Choose!

choices: Their magical power, in addition to her own!
Mother's ancient family castle! Which is haunted!
A pet demon! One totally loyal to her! But with some slightly odd ideas...
Great Grandpa Jo! And he's fed up of this 'skinny' phase she's going through!
Something else! And some other things! And that other thing!
11.content: Violet Nightshade was the daughter of the unlikely pair of a Goth woman who inherited a fortune and a hippy man who wooed her with poetry and a thousand different recipes for chocolate. She was also a very thin girl. She was actually *too* thin according to her Doctor. She'd inherited her Mother's (un)naturally thin body and her taste for gothic romance, which did tend towards forgoing meals in a fit of emotion. Fortunately, she'd also inherited her mother's all-consuming love of chocolate and her father's thousand recipes. As a matter of fact, since her parents had died recently, (well, not so recently, she'd spent a year in mourning dress, writing poetry by her parent's graves and nearly starving herself by forgetting to eat several times) she had also inherited...
11.title: Violet

choices: She has to open the lock with the key from her parent's will.
112.content: "Oh, woe is me!" Violet cried. "Tis fitting that I should live in this place of old! Tis a mausoleum of my ancestors, those dearly departed!" She waited while the wind carried her skirt around her dramatically. As it died down, she slowly walked up to the gates and opened them. A creaky hinge worked its way laboriously around. The gate clanked against the wall. She looked up at the ancient building and the dead trees that surrounded it and felt a chill down her spine.
112.title: Mother's ancient family castle! Which is ha...

choices: The Ghost Butler is pleased that she is showing the dead proper respect.
The Ghost Cook is worried at how thin the poor dear looks. She needs a big feed!
Other Spirits Of The Night...I mean Options
1121.content:
As the door began to open itself, Violet waited politely, though she wasn't surprised. This was her mother's castle, after all. She looked inside and was utterly unsurprised to see no one at all. The old stone floor was covered with a dusty rug and the walls with antique tapestries. There were many doors in the room, and a grand set of stairs at the other end, that split in two halfway up. She walked in and stroked a tapestry with a hand. It left dark marks on her fingers, but she didn't mind. There was so much history here, so many generations of ancestors here to welcome her. In fact, there was one now.

It took all of her nerve to keep her appearance of gothic wistfullness when she realised that she had seen a translucent white ghost appear before her very eyes. She couldn't keep her voice from cracking with a mixture of fear and delight as she spoke:

"Greetings, oh, spirit of restful death. What doth such a shade ask of their humble mortal brethren?"
1121.title: The door opens by itself.

choices: "Well, I expect you both have names. I can't just call you by you titles."
11212.content:
"Oh, my poor dear! If you really want to know, it would be wonderful to have someone to really cook for once more! You look like you could really use it to! You're all skin and bones, not that there's anything wrong with that, but it's a little bit worrying when you ain't dead yet!" The spirit of the night was a large woman, who was called jolly when she was alive, but would have been called obese if she lived now. This wasn't going quite how Violet planned, but it was true. She was dangerously underweight. Maybe she could be goth and still eat well, if the cook was a ghost? She certainly couldn't turn down her friend, since she'd been here a lot longer than Violet had.

"Well, I suppose I am a little hungry." Violet admitted, while her stomach growled like a hungry lion with the first mention of food.

"More than a little, I'd wager. And if not, I reckon you oughta be!" The cook shooed Violet into the dining room. Her touch was like ice, but somehow friendly all the same. She pulled out a chair by waving at it and called "Alfie!".

"Yes, Ma'am?" A deep voice came booming through the room from nowhere. "Ah, I see we have a guest. My apologies for not attending the door myself, I was currently possessing the cellar, attempting to take stock of the wine." At some point he must have manifested in person because his voice gradually grew more quiet, and more focused. It was behind Violet's left shoulder. He leant down from his height of six foot four to speak to her. She was only five foot tall. "If Madam would care to be seated?" Violet sat. "Then I expect you have some questions, while Cook prepares a meal?" Violet span around in time to see Cook disappear into the kitchen.
11212.title: The Ghost Cook is worried at how thin the poor ...

choices: Of course she eats it all, it's chocolate
112121.content:
Butler seemed genuinely pleased at her question, that it wasn't some inane, horrified query like 'What the heck is going on?" like they often got from new owners. Clearly, her parents had taught her well. And the fact that she asked for their names so soon was a very good sign. "I am Alfred. Or Alfie, if you would prefer. Mr Deets if we have company, please. But, if you would be so kind, never EVER call me Alf. It holds bad memories for me." He paused for her to ask the awkward question of whether it had to do with his death or simply *that* TV show. When she didn't ask it, his esteem for her grew all the more. "Cook's name is Deborah, or Debbie, or Mrs Hanson if we have company. She also has a fondness for nicknames, both giving them to people and recieving them. She may refer to me as Pebble."

They talked about Violet's parents for about a half hour, till Deborah came in with the food. She'd clearly learnt a lot from Violet's father, about Violet inheriting her mother's sweet-tooth, and her addiction to chocolate, as well as many of his chocolate-filled recipes designed specifically to indulge that need. Although she had only two hands, she was somehow carrying three trays of food, all coated with the rich brown colouring of chocolate.

She had one tray with four different large chocolate milkshakes, another tray holding a large cake lined with thick chocolate cream, and a third tray that fit three chocolate coated donuts and a large unopened box of actual chocolates.

Violet tried to protest, "I couldn't possibly eat that much. Even if it is chocolate." Unfortunately for her protest, just the sight of that much chocolate had started her salivating wildly, so much so that when it came to actually saying the word 'chocolate' she literally drooled onto her chin. Alfie had already prepared a napkin and swiftly wiped the drool from her face with a smile.

Cook ignored her, putting the trays down before her at the head of the table and saying: "Now, we both know that's not true, dear. In fact, you just holler if you want anymore, alright? I can summon up more ingredients in a jiffy!"

Alfie spread a cloth over Violet's lap, then thought better of it and tucked one under her chin like a bib, too. The staff ghosts sat down to watch their young mistress enjoy her meal.
112121.title: "Well, I expect you both have names. I can&...

choices: Debbie goes and fetches some more chocolate. After all, she *is* terribly thin.
Alfie picks her up and carries her off to the master bedroom, to get changed.
1121211.content: Violet loses herself in a daze, hypnotized by the seductive sight of so much chocolate. Her mouth waters at the smell. She begins stuffing her face with slices of rich, moist, chocolate sponge cake, then an enormous donut, then more cake, and bit of the shake to wash it down with. Her cheeks were filling up with food and it was smearing over her lips, even dribbling a line of milkshake down the side of her chin. She didn't stop. She didn't even seem to notice what a mess she was making on her face. She just kept stuffing herself with cake, and donuts and milkshake. She stopped for a second just long enough to undo the clothes she wore a little and wipe her mouth on the back of an arm. Of course she soon demolished the donuts and consumed every crumb of cake. She had one last shake left, when she picked up the box of chocolates. They were all her favourites, of course, made to the recipes left by her father. She flung chocolates into her mouth one after another after another, chewing them all at the same time, and swallowing occasionally. Soon, she had finished the first layer, and flung the wrappers to one side to get at the second layer. Then, because her maid was no fool, she found a third layer and consumed that almost as quickly as the first two, before grasping the final litre of thick chocolatey shake and drinking the whole thing without stopping. She sat back with a sigh of contentment and a huge smile, one which was absolutely *covered* in chocolate. She absent-mindedly wiped her mouth again on her arm, noticed the chocolate on it, and licked it off.
1121211.title: Of course she eats it all, it's chocolate

14.content:
Maria sat in her house doing her favorite hobby: eating.

She had grown to obesity, so it was hard to move.
14.title: Maria

141.content: The Doorbell rang! Maria had to heft herself out of the chair to get it...At the door was...
141.title: The doorbell rings

1411.content:
A handsome young man was standing in the doorway with the pizza she ordered earlier

"You're...Maria I presume?" He said

"I am." Maria said

"I'm here with your pizza..." He said "...It's a large deep dish with sausage and onions."

"You must be awfully tired after your long journey!" Maria said "Why don't you come in and rest a bit?"

"Oh! You don't have to do that..." The Pizza Guy said

"Please!" Maria said "I insist! I have some homemade strawberry lemonade I made it myself!"

"Well..." The Pizza Guy said
1411.title: The Handsome Pizza Delivery Guy!

14111.content:
"Well..." The Pizza Guy said "I guess I could use a little break..."

"Wonderful!" Maria said "Step right into the kitchen and leave the pizza on the counter while I fix us some drinks!"

Maria then fixed up two tall glasses of fresh strawberry lemonade each glass had a fresh strawberry placed on the rim.

The Pizza Guy took a sip of his beverage and his eyes widened

"Wow!" He said "This is really good!"

"It just comes naturally...I didn't catch your name."

"My name is Guy." The Pizza Guy said

"A delivery guy named Guy..." Maria chuckled as she opened up the Pizza Box

"This smells delicious!" She said "Do you want to a slice?"

"Oh I could possibly...Guy started to say

"Relax!" Maria said "Who's going to find out?"

She gave Guy a single slice of pizza while she took the rest

She quickly wolfed down the pizza and washed it down with the strawberry lemonade

"Wow..." Guy said as he nibbled on his strawberry "I've never seen anyone eat so quickly!"

Maria looked at him and said
14111.title: He Accepts

choices: She gets to the grocery store
142.content: Unfortunately for Maria she had run out of food AGAIN! She hefted herself off her chair and started to waddle out the door to do her grocery shopping.
142.title: She runs out of food

1421.content:
Maria was famished when she got to the Grocery Store...All she could think about was getting some food!

She made a beeline straight for the...
1421.title: Famished at the Grocery Store

choices: Got out her wallet and payed for the candy
Tried to make a break for it!
14211.content:
Maria hurried as fast as she could to the Candy Aisle

As quick as she could she started cramming candy into her mouth!

She started with a large chocolate bar...She was practically tearing the wrapper into little ribbons, and eating the chocolate at the same time! When she was done there was a big chocolate stain on her mouth!

Then she started on the lollipops, she unwrapped a chocolate Tootsie Pop first and started sucking on it.

That's when a clerk came over to her and said "I hope you're going to pay for that Ma'am..."

Maria
14211.title: Candy Asle

choices: To Find Something Else to Eat!
14212.content:
Maria grabbed her shopping basket and headed for the Produce Aisle.

She found some bananas and put them in her basket, she found some sweet cherries and put then in her basket also

"I can make a nice fruit salad with all this fruit!" She said

She got three different kinds of melons, cantaloupe, honeydew, and watermelon and then she got some nice strawberries.

She purchased the fruit and went home to make her fruit salad

When her fruit salad was complete it was sweet and sticky with a sugary syrup!

"Yum!" Maria said as she ate a spoonful of fruit salad "This stuff is good!'

She quickly ate the entire bowl of fruit salad...She then decided...
14212.title: Produce Asle

142122.title: To Find Something Else to Eat!

choices: She realized she hadn't payed for it!
A bunch of cats wanted her sushi!
14213.content:
She went up to the Sushi Bar

"I'm really hungry!" She said "I want two dozen California rolls, half a dozen Philadelphia rolls, eight pieces of Nigiri sushi..."

Soon she had enough sushi to feed a small army! She started cramming Sushi into her mouth when...
14213.title: The Sushi Bar

1422.content:
First Maria wanted a 'little snack' before doing any grocery shopping.

But where should she go? To the Pizza Parlor? To the ice cream parlor? Or somewhere else?
1422.title: But First a snack

choices: Decided to get on with her grocery shopping
14221.content:
She waddled into the Pizza Parlor and said "I'd like one large ham and pineapple pizza please!"

The clerk at the counter was more then a little surprised by Maria's physique but none the less he said "I'll commit to it at once!"

Maria sat at and extra large table as her stomach rumbled with hunger, she patted her belly and said "Easy there stomach..."

Soon the Waiter came with her large Hawaiian pizza.

As soon as it was placed in front of her Maria tore into her pizza like a wild animal! Soon there was noting left but crumbs!

Maria let out a large belch and...
14221.title: The Pizza Parlor

choices: She went to the grocery store
14222.content:
Maria waddled into Roxie Road's ice cream parlor Roxie's eyes widened when she saw Maria's obese new form!

"I'd like a banana split please!" Maria rumbled "I want one scoop each of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry! Don't skimp of the whipped cream and I want a FRESH cherry! Not any maraschino stuff!"

"Yes Ma'am!" Said Roxie "Right away Ma'am!" She was a little afraid that Maria would eat HER if she wasn't satisfied quick enough!"

Soon Maria was gulping down her banana split in record time, she let out a large belch and patted her tummy

And then...
14222.title: The Ice Cream Parlor

151.content: Roxie Road- A sim who owns a ice cream shop
151.title: Your choice

choices: Kingdom: She becomes addicted to King Roland's Cupcakes...
Agents: She gets captured during a mission...
SkyHeroes: Too many fishing trips with Barney and Mira...
152.content: What about Lyndsay from MySims Kingdom? The real question is, which version of her?
152.title: Your choice

info.brief_description: The girls from MySims gain weight...
info.description:
MySims female weight gain? Never been done before! Until now!

In the town of Danton, things keep expanding... including the girls!

No Sex
No Breast Expansion
No Butt Expansion
No Inflation
No massive WG

Ray guns allowed
Magic allowed
